1)	1+2%*(15+20%*100) + 1 + 20%*5%*(15+20%*100) =3.05

2)	Cache Contents						Address		Outcome
	0000, 0010, 0020, 0030, 0100, 0110, 0120, 0130		3020		Miss (Compulsory)
	0000, 0010, 3020, 0030, 0100, 0110, 0120, 0130		3030 		Miss (Compulsory)
	0000, 0010, 3020, 3030, 0100, 0110, 0120, 0130		2100		Miss (Compulsory)
	0000, 0010, 3020, 3030, 2100, 0110, 0120, 0130		0012		Hit
	0000, 0010, 3020, 3030, 2100, 0110, 0120, 0130		0020		Miss (Conflict)
	0000, 0010, 0020, 3030, 2100, 0110, 0120, 0130		0030		Miss (Conflict)
	0000, 0010, 0020, 0030, 2100, 0110, 0120, 0130 		0110		Hit
	0000, 0010, 0020, 0030, 2100, 0110, 0120, 0130 		0100		Miss (Conflict)
	0000, 0010, 0020, 0030, 0100, 0110, 0120, 0130 		2100		Miss (Conflict)
	0000, 0010, 0020, 0030, 2100, 0110, 0120, 0130 		3020		Miss (Conflict)

3)	Bug   	    	  	Correct	      	  Example
	set[7]  |= address[31]	no		  1000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 confused with 1000 0000 0000 0000 1000 0000 0000 0000
	set[7]  ^= address[31]	yes		  
	tag[0]  &= address[15]	no		  0000 0000 0000 0000 1000 0000 0000 0000 confused with 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 
	tag[0]  ^= address[15]	yes		  
	set[7]  &= address[2]	no		  0000 0000 0000 0000 1000 0000 0000 0000 confused with 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000		  
	set[7]  ^= address[2]	no		  0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 confused with 0000 0000 0000 1000 0000 0000 0000 0010
	set[0]  |= address[9]	no		  0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0010 0000 0000 confused with 0000 0000 0000 0000 0001 0000 0000 0000 
	set[0]  ^= address[9]	yes
	tag[15] |= address[16]	no		  0000 0000 0000 0000 0001 0000 0000 0000 confused with 1000 0000 0000 0001 0000 0000 0000 0000 
	tag[15] ^= address[16]	yes
	tag[0]  |= address[16]	yes
	tag[0]  ^= address [16] yes
